content.html: The elephant in the room when it comes to the suggestion that prisons are designed to minimise sexual violence is of course this: Two thirds of prison staff disciplined for sexual harassment were allowed to keep their jobs. bylinetimes.com/2021/12/23/nea…
content.value:
The elephant in the room when it comes to the suggestion that prisons are designed to minimise sexual violence is of course this:

Two thirds of prison staff disciplined for sexual harassment were allowed to keep their jobs.
bylinetimes.com/2021/12/23/nea…
